oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Wharf Scene with Railroad
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: “Wharf Scene, Mississippi River, Memphis, Tenn.” Color image with railway and train in forefront, boats and river behind, and Harahan Bridge in the far background.
“245 East Girard Dr -- Phila -- Pa -- Sep 20/08 -- Dear Brother -- will be home -- Saturday let us -- hope so Phila -- is good enough -- for me -- Harry -- Ford Hotel -- 119 Adams St.”
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mississippi River; rivers; riverscapes; landscapes; railroads; railways;
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: International Post Card Co., New York
